title: Free utilities included with apartment, Storage Units, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Large studio apartments', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Laundry facilities', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Large two bedroom apartments', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Large loft apartments', '-Basketball Court', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
